    private void txtdientichActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                            
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                           

    private void TinhActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                     
        float r=Integer.parseInt(txtBK.getText());
        float cv = (float) (2*Math.PI*r);
        float dt =  (float) (2*r*r);
        txtchuvi.setText(cv+" ");
        txtdientich.setText(dt+" ");
    }

     * @param args the command line arguments

            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(BT71.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
